```{r}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```

# Plot PE through time

```{r}
pe<-read_csv(here("output_data/results/PE_baseline_calculations.csv"))
```
All PAs
```{r}

ggplot(pe, aes(x = Year, y = CAPAD_PE)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_bw() +
  labs(y = "Protection Equality",
       x = "Year")
```
```{r}
ggsave(here("figures/All_PAs_Protection_equality.png"), width =9, height=7)
```
